About.profileText: In my work experience as a FullStack Web Developer, I've used multiple programming languages â€‹â€‹to always create a solution that's appropriate for the development needs. I'm currently constantly learning about FullStack development and techniques like SOLID principles to deepen my knowledge and improve the quality and agility of software development.

data.title: NODE SCRAPING
data.subtitle: Data Scraping Application
data.description: It is a simple tool to obtain updated information on exchange rates published by the Bank of Mexico. Through the form, you can automatically generate a PDF file with the latest data, extracted directly from the source page.

data.title: MARKER SIMULATOR
data.subtitle: Google Maps Simulator
data.description: This application generates markers with random information within the Google Maps map. It uses a GeoJSON file to draw a coordinate polygon on the map and adds markers within its area.

data.title: PointOfSale App
data.subtitle: Point of Sale Demo
data.description: This application is a simple point of sale that uses 'local storage' with the Zustand handler to store active orders. Its functions consist of managing orders and displaying their totals.

data.title: AMORTIZATION CALCULATOR
data.subtitle: Amortization Simulator
data.description: This application functions as a tool to calculate a payment amortization table based on the amount, interest rate, and number of periods, in addition to providing tools to export the generated data.

data.title: PASSWORD GENERATOR
data.subtitle: Password Generator
data.description: This tool's function is to generate random passwords, allowing the creation of unique and robust passwords in a personalized way. The user can adjust various parameters, such as password length, the set of allowed characters (uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, symbols), and the complexity of the combinations.

data.title: SISPAG
data.subtitle: Promissory Note System
data.description: Private system, custom-made, in the real estate area. It is a system I developed for the company Exelco, starting from the entire life cycle of a software system.

data.title: TRACTOR LOGBOOK
data.subtitle: Unit Monitoring Logbook
data.description: Unit monitoring system for a transport company, performs CRUD functions with user permissions and instant modifications between users to export information to another proprietary system of the company.
